snippet.title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Knights of Britannia - PS4 - Coming to PS4! (announcement trailer)
snippet.description:
The Seven Deadly Sins: Knights of Britannia is coming to the Europe early 2018 exclusively for PS4 – both digital and boxed with EFIGS localization. 
Based on the popular manga and anime series The Seven Deadly Sins, The Seven Deadly Sins: Knights of Britannia is the first action-packed adventure video game on console based The Seven Deadly Sins.

The Seven Deadly Sins is a legendary gang of rebels who have been blamed for overthrowing the Kingdom of Lionesse and are hunted by elite guards called Holy Knights. When a young girl appears, with an earnest wish in her head and a determination to find The Seven Deadly Sins, the world gets turned on its head and an extraordinary adventure begins!
